title: Master Yi should be nerfed in ARURF/URF
body:
I have played ARURF at PBE server for about 20 games till now, and have seen many funny and interesting champions. But, only one champion - Master Yi - is a big balance breaker in the game. Because Master Yi has one of the best avoiding skills, it is impossible to kill Master Yi in the late games. Also, when Yi uses his Ultimate, it seems that his Q skill cooldown also gets reduced, which makes him almost immune to all the damage. 

Therefore, I argue that Yi's Q cooldown should be nerfed in ARURF/URF, unless this mode will be very disgusting game for those who faces Master Yi.

Thank you for reading my argument and feel free to talk please.
